revised_title: Observations on Animalcules in Testicles, Muscles, Oysters, and Vines
tldr: The author examines animalcules in testicles, muscles, oysters, and vines, observing their structure and behavior. He suggests that these tiny organisms may be generated differently than eels and may have a role in reproduction. The author also finds various types of animalcules in different environments and speculates about their life cycles.
